titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid to the Training and Access Working Group records SSC.MS.00750

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2019-04-04 14:35:15 -0400.

change.item: This record was migrated from InMagic DB Textworks to ArchivesSpace.
Added one accession and updated finding aid.

did.unittitle: Training and Access Working Group records
did.abstract: Founded in 1995, TAWG (Training and Access Working Group) is a clearinghouse of more than two dozen local, state and national organizations working together to ensure the continued availability of well-trained abortion providers. The papers contain meeting agendas, minutes, participant lists, notes, correspondence, brochures and publications by others.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Founded in 1995, TAWG (Training and Access Working Group) is a clearinghouse of more than two dozen local, state and national organizations working together to ensure the continued availability of well-trained abortion providers. These partner organizations include the Alan Guttmacher Institute, National Network of Abortion Funds, and Planned Parenthood Federation of America, all of whose records are also held by the Sophia Smith Collection.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: To the extent that it owns copyright, Training and Access Working Group (TAWG) has retained copyright in its works donated to Smith College. Copyright in other items in this collection may be held by their respective creators. For reproductions of materials that are governed by fair use as defined under U. S. Copyright Law, no permission to cite or publish is required. For those few instances beyond fair use, or which may regard materials in the collection not created by TAWG, researchers are responsible for determining who may hold materials' copyrights and obtaining approval from them. Researchers do not need anything further from Smith College Special Collections to move forward with their use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Training and Access Working Group (TAWG) records, Sophia Smith Collection, SSC-MS-00750, Smith College Special Collections, Northampton, Massachusetts.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: Marlene Fried Papers, Planned Parenthood Federation of America II Records, Ms. Foundation for Women Records, National Network of Abortion Funds, Alan Guttmacher Institute Records

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Meeting agendas, minutes, participant lists, notes, and correspondence; brochures and publications by others.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for use without restriction beyond the standard terms and conditions of Smith College Special Collections.
